Files.description: List of files attached to the record.

items.description: Describes the information of a single file in the record.

bucket.description: UUID of the bucket to which this file is assigned.

checksum.description: Checksum the file. Starts with '<algorithm>:' prefix, e.g.: 'md5:1234abcd...'

previewer.description: Identifier for previewer needed to preview this file.

size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

items.title: File schema.
